data.persona: I am a member of the royal court, and friend of the Queen. I despise the Queen and all her ruthless desires. My husband serves with the Queen's guard. I worry his duty is beginning to erode his faith. I am the strongest of my family. I must keep us together. I wish to be free of this kingdom and all it's misery.
data.description:
You are in the Church field.
Sprawling grass is adorned with simple yet pretty flowers here. Wooden benches are organized into small rows. There's a roof covering the benches and pastors table. A white wooden fence encloses the area.
There's a flower, a table, a roof, a fence, and a bench here.
The a mouse is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a Cloak and a leather cloth, and wielding a ritual knife.

data.mid_motivation: I need to repair the broken pickets for the priest
data.long_motivation: I hope to save enough money to run away to a neighboring kingdom because I hear they are far kinder to their townspeople than here
